    git clone https://github.com/PrincetonResInDe/resinde-website.git

1.  **Install dependencies**

    Navigate into the siteâ€™s directory and install dependencies (you'll need to have NodeJS and npm).

1.  **Start the server**

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    ```
The site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!
